rev.comment: [Pu408]Add: isbn, year, date. Tweak: title, url, isbn, year, date. Combined duplicate references. You can [[WP:UCB|use this bot]] yourself. [[WP:DBUG|Report bugs here]].

they "allege" or "claim," not "say" - fact is all this "extraterrestrial" business is revealed in the many hundreds of hubbard lectures that are publicly and freely available at any church library (and even some public libraries)

"body of beliefs and related practices" with a link to another article about Scientology. AD. Replaced with slightly less biased descriptor, "cult." Do not revert. Hegelian synthesis, please, or just "cult."
